name: Auto-Forward-Bot-V2
description: Telegram's Best Smart Plugin File Forward Bot

API_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @UseTGSBot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @UseTGSBot

BANNED_USERS.description: Comma-separated list of banned user IDs. If empty, no users are banned.

DATABASE_NAME.description: The type of file to filter (e.g., document, audio, photo, video, animation).
